Jom Research is a dedicated academic consultancy platform owned by TMH Research Kits Resources (SSM registration no: 202303206919/ CT0125644-X), based in Malaysia. Jom Research was established with the specific purpose of offering easily accessible and high-quality webinars focused on research and statistical analysis.

What truly distinguishes Jom Research is our commitment to providing a comprehensive and seamless learning journey. Our meticulously designed webinars ensure that every participant, from those just starting their exploration to seasoned researchers seeking advanced insights, can progress effectively. We cover a full spectrum of concepts, starting from the foundational basics and advancing smoothly to the most sophisticated topics and cutting-edge techniques in research and statistical analysis.
